definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[סלע]] (√ of foll.; cf. Ar. sala9a cleave, split, sil9un cleft, fissure, Lane:1406, hence [[סֶלַע]] split, jagged cliff, crag, oft. isolated (split off) rock (cf. Wetzst:De Is 3, 696–707; and esp. ZAW iii (1883), 273); then of smaller fragments, NH [[סֶלַע]] rock, stone, also scale (of serpent), weight (in trade); Aram. [[סִלְעָא]] specif. weight for coin; Nab. [[סלי]], a coin Lzb:329 Cook:85).
